DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic property C3G administration Mulberry fruit extract 12 healthy Korean volunteer . Plasma concentration C3G antioxidative marker total antioxidative capacity attack free oxygen radical measure . Additional objective investigate multiple dose ( 2 week ) safety daily 1000mg Mulberry fruit extract . This study , exploratory trial , require statistical hypothesis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics C3G Estimate Antioxidative Markers After Repeated Administration Mulberry Fruit Extract
DOC.criteria: Body weight > 55 kg male , > 45 kg female ( within 80120 % Ideal body weight ) Give write informed consent voluntarily decide participation Acute chronic disease symptom screen Existing active clinically significant disease involve one organ system Known allergy Mulberry berry Positive drug alcohol screen Smokers 10 cigarette per day Participation clinical trial last 2 month prior start study Pregnancy
